description: Try our easy to follow Mango Frappe recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango Frappe Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place coconut water, sugar, juice and lemongrass stem in a saucepan. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool and allow the flavours to infuse.

Strain syrup into a blender. Discard solids. Remove flesh from mangoes and roughly chop. Set a little aside to use as a garnish, then add to blender with sorbet and ice. Blend until thick and smooth. Spoon into glasses and serve topped with reserved mango.
